name: vue-reader
description: A SPA reader, base on vue and express.
author: tgxh2020 <tgxh2020@gmail.com>

scripts.start: cd app && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm start
scripts.start-server: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development supervisor app.js
scripts.build: cd app && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.analyze: cd app && cross-env NODE_ENV=production ANALYZE=true npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run prod
